info.name: Consumer Reports--Jim Can Read It!
info.description:
Improved contrast, colors, and font size for folks like me that cannot read, for instance, light grey text on a lighter grey background or very small fonts.

Keywords: High Contrast, Readability, Light Theme, Lite Theme, Dark Font, Better Contrast, ConsumerReports
info.additionalInfo:
